body_html:
For what's missing: at a minimum we need to check that calls to _dims() and _nDimension are valid because they currently call these to check that a tensor is non-empty and thus they may divide by zero.

Other things on my list:

  • stack/split/any other function with "size", "length" in its name probably need support.
  • indexing definitely needs support
  • Check the new THS-equivalent.

Check the new THS-equivalent.
body:
For what's missing: at a minimum we need to check that calls to _dims() and _nDimension are valid because they currently call these to check that a tensor is non-empty and thus they may divide by zero.

Other things on my list:
- stack/split/any other function with "size", "length" in its name probably need support.
- indexing definitely needs support
- Check the new THS-equivalent.
